member.name: T:Epicor.Mfg.BO.MoveRequest
member.summary: Client side business object for MoveRequest.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.MoveRequestImpl.CheckEmployee(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: This method needs to be called from the main menu only. if the object is being called from the shop floor menu then the employee id has already been determined and validated and is passed in

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.MoveRequestImpl.GetNewMoveRequest(System.String,Epicor.Mfg.BO.MoveRequestDataSet)
member.summary: Call this method to create a new Epicor.Mfg.BO.MoveRequestDataSet with the RequestType

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.MoveRequestImpl.OnChangeAssembly(System.Int32,Epicor.Mfg.BO.MoveRequestDataSet)
member.summary: Call this method when the AssemblySeq field changes RowMod must be "A" or "U" for this method to work

member.summary: Call this method when the FromBin field changes RowMod must be "A" or "U" for this method to work

member.summary: Call this method when the FromWhse field changes RowMod must be "A" or "U" for this method to work

member.summary: Call this method when the lotNum field changes RowMod must be "A" or "U" for this method to work

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.MoveRequestImpl.OnChangeMtlSeq(System.Int32,Epicor.Mfg.BO.MoveRequestDataSet)
member.summary: Call this method when the MtlSeq field changes if RequestType = "MW":U then MtlSeq is actually the JobOper.OprSeq RowMod must be "A" or "U" for this method to work

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.MoveRequestImpl.ProcessRequest(Epicor.Mfg.BO.MoveRequestDataSet)
member.summary: Must set the MoveRequest RowMod to "U" or "A" for this method to work The method updates the Mtl Queue record when the user is done inputing data
